# Frame the Problem - Inception Data Sources

This document provides a reference mapping to help fill out the `1-frame-the-problem.md` template using the data generated during the Lean Inception workshop.

## ⚠️ Precedence Rules
**Step 8 (MVP Canvas) is the source of truth for SCOPE and CONSTRAINTS.**
If Step 1 (Vision) contradicts Step 8 (e.g., listing a feature that Step 8 says is "Out of Scope"), you MUST follow Step 8.

| Template Section | Inception Source Document | Sections to Reference |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **1. The Big Idea** | `docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md`<br>`docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` | **1. MVP Proposal** (Primary Source - strict MVP focus)<br>**1.1 The Elevator Pitch** (Secondary - broader context) |
| **2. Target Audience** | `docs/inception/3-personas.md`<br>`docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` | **All Personas** (Primary & Secondary)<br>**3. Personas & Journey Alignment** |
| **3. The Problem Space** | `docs/inception/3-personas.md`<br>`docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` | **Pains/Frustrations** sections in Personas<br>**3. Personas** (See "Pain Solved") |
| **4. Desired Outcomes** | `docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md`<br>`docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` | **1.2 Product Goals**<br>**4. Hypothesis & Success Metrics** (Validation Metrics: Adoption, Satisfaction) |
| **5. Business Motivation** | `docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md`<br>`docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` | **1.2 Product Goals** (Efficiency targets)<br>**4. Hypothesis** (e.g. reduce time by 50%) |
| **6. Boundaries & Risks** | `docs/inception/8-mvp-canvas-definition.md` (PRIMARY)<br>`docs/inception/1-product-vision-and-boundaries.md`<br>`docs/inception/2-tradeoffs.md` | **2. Explicitly Out of Scope** (Step 8 - **OVERRIDES OTHER DOCS**)<br>**1.3 Product Is/Is Not** (Step 1)<br>**Constraints & Trade-off Sliders** (Step 2)<br>**5. Risks & Mitigation** (Step 8) |
